column4: hey. i got a folder witch it /var/www/ , and i want that once i go to /home/user12/www it will follow to the /var/www/ ... i think the command is ln -s somthing.. anyone can tell me what is the correct syntax?
im now in the shell at /
you want to create a symbolic link.. ln -s is the right command.. "cd ~" then "ln -s /var/www www"
